Our analyst team noted its 20–50% performance boost on GitHub tasks as a sign of rapid evolution in self-coding AI, calling this a pivotal development for AI automation and software productivity.

Job Apocalypse May Already Be HereThis article discusses the difficult hiring landscape for recent grads—particularly in computer science—amidst rising AI adoption and automation.
